data.title: Updated Timeline for the California Community Reinvestment Grants Program
data.excerpt:
Dear California Community Reinvestment Grants Program Interested Parties,
The Governor’s Office of Business and Economic Development (GO-Biz) announced the release of the California Community Reinvestment Grants (CalCRG) program Draft Grant Solicitation for public review and comment on February 15, 2019. Included in the draft was a timeline with the release of the Final Grant Solicitation planned for April 8, 2019.
data.author: Department of Cannabis Control
tags: Governor's Office of Business and Economic Development
